active-campaigns.empty: You have no active campaigns currently.

joinModal.titleNotMember: Do you want to join this group?
joinModal.bodyNoneFound: It looks like you are searching by group join code, but we can't find any group matching that code ({{ code }}). Do you want to do a full text search or close and try again?

permission.title: Who will be able to call meetings, votes, etc?

unsubscribe-modal.header: You are about to unsubscribe from this group. You will only be able to rejoin if someone adds you back. Are you sure you want to leave?

unsubscribe-alert.text: Done! You have been removed from the group

alias.link: Change your name in this group
alias.title: Change my name in group
alias.header: What name will you use in this group? (Leave it blank to reset to your normal name)
alias.alert-text: Done! You name in this group was changed
alias.alert-error: Sorry, there was an error changing your group alias

dashboard.no-meetings: You don't have any meetings coming up. Call a meeting to your group or a task team to deliberate issues and decide action.
dashboard.no-votes: You don't have any active votes. Create and send a vote to your group or segment of members to poll their opinion or make a decision.
dashboard.no-todos: You don't have any open actions. Create an action to ask your group or some members to volunteer, send information, or take any other action

joinMethods.joinWords: 2. SMS with a join word to {{ shortCode }}
joinMethods.clickLink: 3. Click on one of your short links
joinMethods.noWordsLeft: You have run out of join words (each group can have up to three). To create a new one, please remove an old one first.
joinMethods.joinWordCbText: To join {{ groupName }}, SMS {{ joinWord }} to {{ shortCode}}, dial {{ ussdCode }}, or click: {{ shortUrl }}

addJoinWord.none: You can help people join the group by creating join words:
addJoinWord.some: You can add {{ joinWordsLeft }} more join words to this group:

joinMethods.joinWordTaken: Sorry, that join word is already taken
joinMethods.joinTopicsLabel: Join topics (displayed when a user hits the join page or dials the join code)

descriptors.ADDED_BY_SYS_ADMIN: Via: Added by Grassroot system admin
descriptors.SELF_JOINED: Via: Used USSD join code in past
descriptors.ADDED_BY_OTHER_MEMBER: Via: Added by another member ({{ joinMethodDescriptor }})

descriptors.SMS_JOIN_WORD: Via: message with group join word ({{ joinMethodDescriptor }})
descriptors.URL_JOIN_WORD: Via: clicking on a link related to join word ({{ joinMethodDescriptor }})
descriptors.JOIN_CODE_OTHER: Via: group join code ({{ joinMethodDescriptor }}) with unknown channel
descriptors.FILE_IMPORT: Via: bulk import of file ({{ joinMethodDescriptor }})
descriptors.ADDED_SUBGROUP: Via: added to task team ({{ joinMethodDescriptor }})
descriptors.COPIED_INTO_GROUP: Via: copied into group from another ({{ joinMethodDescriptor }})

meetingModal.title: Create new meeting
meetingModal.subject: Meeting subject
meetingModal.public-explain: This will allow people to see the meeting if they search for it
meetingModal.image-note: Note: Image will not be included directly in SMS or email notification, but a short link will be attached that references it
meetingModal.description-place: Longer description of meeting (optional, will not be included in SMS, will be visible to web, email and Android users)
meetingModal.confirmParaAssigned: You are about to call a meeting about {{ subject }} at {{ location }}, on {{ time }}. The following {{ assignedNumber }} people will be invited: {{ memberNames }}
meetingModal.confirmParaAll: You are about to call a meeting about {{ subject }} at {{ location }}, on {{ time }}. The whole group ({{ assignedNumber }} members) will be notified.

voteModal.title: Create new vote
voteModal.subject: Subject for the vote?
voteModal.description-place: Longer description of vote (optional, will not be included in SMS, will be visible to web and Android users)
voteModal.multiOption: Set my own list of options
voteModal.confirmParaAssigned: You are about to call a vote on {{ subject }}, closing at {{ time }}. The following {{ assignedNumber }} people will be invited: {{ memberNames }}
voteModal.confirmParaAll: You are about to call a vote on {{ subject }}, closing at {{ time }}. The whole group ({{ assignedNumber }} members) will be polled.

todoModal.title: Create new action
todoModal.subject: Subject for the action
todoModal.confirmParaAssigned: You are about to create an action item, with the title {{ subject }}, due by {{ time }}. The action item is assigned to the following {{ assignedNumber }} members: {{ memberNames }}
todoModal.confirmParaAll: You are about to create an action item, with the title {{ subject }}, due by {{ time }}. The action item is assigned to the whole group ({{ assignedNumber }} members)

campaign.no-account: Sorry, to create or manage campaigns you need a Grassroot Extra account. To create one, please send an email to accounts@grassroot.org.za.

create.title: Let's Setup a New Campaign
create.name: Campaign Name/Title
create.descriptionPlace: A longer description of the campaign (optional). This will be shown to uses who click on a short link
create.petition-link: Do you want to add an Amandla Awethu petition?
create.petition-place: Address of your Amandla Awethu petition (https://...)

errors.typeRequired: You must select a campaign type
errors.groupRequired: You must create or choose a master group
errors.urlFormat: Please enter a valid URL (or leave blank)

complete.success: Done! Now please enter the campaign's messages
complete.error: Sorry, there was an error creating the campaign:

members.title: {{ total }} people have joined the campaign

languages.link: Choose what languages you'd like to support
languages.modal-title: Choose which languages you'd like to use for the USSD channel
languages.error: Please select at least one language

placeholders.OPENING: The SA National Department of Health (NDOH) is establishing the National Health Insurance (NHI) to achieve universal access to quality health care for all who live in South Africa.
placeholders.MORE_INFO: We welcome the commitment from the NDOH to a NHI based on principles of equity, health as a right and redress of past inequalities.
placeholders.SIGN_PETITION: Thanks for participating. Let's get your details to tell you about future events and campaigns
placeholders.JOIN_GROUP: Thanks for joining us. Let's get your details to tell you about future events and campaigns
placeholders.TAG_ME: Thanks for participating. Let's get your details to tell you about future events and campaigns
placeholders.SHARE_PROMPT: Thank you for joining forces with us. If you want to share this with others please type their number
placeholders.SHARE_SEND: Join us! {__name__} has just joined the campaign, {__entity_name__}, and wants to share it with you. Dial *134*1994*{__inbound__}# to join them!
placeholders.EXIT_POSITIVE: Thank you for joining forces with us! We hope to see you soon at one of our events
placeholders.EXIT_NEGATIVE: Thank you for engaging our campaign, and we hope you will join us in the future
placeholders.MEDIA_PROMPT: Thank you for joining forces with us! As a final step, can you share with us a voice note or image about this issue?

explanations.OPENING: This is the first message that a user will see when they enter the code or text a campaign trigger word
explanations.MORE_INFO: An optional screen that allows a second message elaborating on the first
explanations.SIGN_PETITION: The screen that shows after the user has already chosen to sign the petition. The system will automatically ask for any information it doesn't know
explanations.JOIN_GROUP: The screen that shows after a user has opted into joining the campaign's group, opting in for further information
explanations.TAG_ME: The screen that shows after a user has selected a topic that they are interested in
explanations.SHARE_PROMPT: The screen that prompts a user to enter someone else's number in order for the campaign to be shared
explanations.SHARE_SEND: The template for the sharing SMS that goes out. You can leave this blank and we will use the default
explanations.EXIT_POSITIVE: The goodbye message after a user has signed or joined
explanations.EXIT_NEGATIVE: The goodbye message after a user has declined to sign or join
explanations.MEDIA_PROMPT: The final message, which asks the user to submit a media file if they want to do so

done.success: Done! The messages have been set
done.error: Sorry, there was an error updating

settings.title: Update Campaign Settings
settings.name: Campaign Name/Title
settings.need_new: Your campaign's old code has been taken. To reactivate it, please set a new one in the 'code' field
settings.cost_estimate: . You have spent {{ spent }} to date
settings.ended: Done! The campaign has been ended
settings.end-error: Sorry, there was an error ending the campaign

types.title: How would you like to broadcast this message?

content.pageTitle: What would you like to say?
content.titleLabel: Give this message a title for easy reference later

errors.title: Please enter a title for this broadcast
errors.shortMessage: Please enter a short message - if you want to leave it blank, please go back and unselect it
errors.email: Please enter an email. If you want to skip email, please go back and unselect it
errors.facebook: Please enter a Facebook post, or go back and unselect Facebook
errors.twitter: Please enter a Twitter post, or go back and unselect Twitter

members.title: Who would you like to send it to?
members.skipSmsIfEmail: Skip sending SMSs to users with email

schedule.title: When would you like to send it?
schedule.join_campaign: When someone signs up to campaign

sent.IMMEDIATE: Done! Your broadcast is being sent right now
sent.ADDED_TO_GROUP: Done! New members will get the broadcast on joining
sent.FUTURE: Done! The broadcast has been queued for sending

join.title: Join "{{ groupName }}"
join.intro: Just enter your details below to join "{{ groupName }}". By joining, you are agreeing to give the details below to the group's organizer, through the Grassroot platform
join.intro-campaign: Just enter your details below to join "{{ groupName }}". By joining, you are agreeing to give the details below to the campaign's organizer, through the Grassroot platform
join.name: Your name (what people know you by)
join.footnote: * At least one of mobile number or email address are required

topics.title: What are you interested in?
topics.description: Select topics that you would like to hear about:

done.title: Thanks for Joining!
done.body: You've successfully joined the "{{ groupName }}" group. You'll now be able to get involved with group activities, campaigns, and petitions.
done.body-campaign: You've successfully joined the "{{ groupName }}" campaign. You'll now be able to get involved with more campaign actions.
done.about: Grassroot is a platform for organizing your community. See what you can do with Grassroot here. Just enter a password below, and your username will be your email orphone number.

completed.hasPasswordAlert: Done! You have joined the group
completed.hasPasswordAlert-campaign: Done! You have joined the campaign

signUpModal.title: Register for Grassroot?
signUpModal.intro: Thanks! You've joined {{ groupName }}. Do you want to sign up for Grassroot too? It's a platform for organizing your community. You'll still receive communcation from {{ groupName }} even if you don't, but if you want to sign up just enter a password below. Your username will be your email or phone number.

profile.title: My profile
profile.name: Your name
profile.image-none: Add a profile image (click or drag and drop)
profile.otp-note: * We will send you an OTP to confirm your changes
profile.otp-label: We sent a pin to your phone or email. Please enter it below:
profile.completed: Done, your profile has been updated

password.title: Change password
password.completed: Done, your password has been updated
password.error: Sorry, there was an error changing your password, please check your old password again
password.mismatch: Sorry, your passwords do not match

account.title: Grassroot Extra Account
account.name: Account name
account.completed: Done, your account has been updated

modal.body: Are you sure you want to close this account?

integrations.title: Integration settings
integrations.facebook-complete: Done! The Facebook integration is complete
integrations.twitter-complete: Done! The Twitter integration is complete
integrations.google-complete: Done! The Google integration is complete

delete.title: Delete my account
delete.disuasion: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? This will remove you from all Grassroot groups, and remove any personal information we hold about you. We will not be able to undo this - if you choose to return, you will have to enter your name and details, sign up for your groups again, etc. Are you sure you want to proceed?
delete.error-unknown: Sorry, something went wrong deleting your profile. Please try again later, or email contact@grassroot.org.za
delete.otp-prompt: Okay, we'll delete your profile. As a last step, for security reasons we have sent a code to your phone or email (whichever you usually receive notifications on). Please enter the code below and click confirm. After that your profile will be permanently deleted.
delete.otp-error: Sorry, the code you entered is incorrect. Please try again. If you continue to encounter errors, please email contact@grassroot.org.za
delete.done: Done. Your profile is deleted. Goodbye.

opt-out.otp-note: We have sent an OTP to your phone. Please enter it below to opt-out or change password.

login.title: Login
login.error-message: Sorry, wrong phone, email or password
login.forced.logout.message: For security, please enter your login again

initiate.title: Password reset
initiate.info: To reset your password, first please enter the phone number or email address you use to sign into Grassroot
initiate.errorEither: Please enter a valid phone number or email

validate.title: Enter code
validate.info: If your email or phone matched one we have on file, we have sent an OTP to your phone, or if you do not have a phone, to your email. Please enter it below.
validate.error: Sorry, you have entered the wrong code.

new.title: Enter new password
new.error: Sorry, the passwords do not match
new.complete: Done, your password has been reset. You can now login.
new.server_error: Sorry, something went wrong resetting your password, please try again later

registration.title: Your Account Details
registration.displayname: Your name (what people know you by)
registration.footnote: * At least one of mobile number or email address is required

otp-modal.title: OTP required
otp-modal.label: For security, we need to verify these contact details are yours. We have sent a code to your phone or email. Please check them and enter it below:

respondModal.title: Action item
respondModal.responded: Done, your response has been sent to the organizer

cancel.title: Confirm cancellation
cancel.body: Are you sure? The action item will disappear from your and others' lists. You can choose whether to notify members
cancel.done: Done. The action item has been cancelled and members notified

respond.title: Respond to action item

body.information: {{ caller }} has requested information about {{ title }}. If you want to respond, just type your response below and click 'submit'.
body.volunteer: {{ caller }} has requested volunteers for {{ title }}. If you want to volunteer, just click below, and they'll be sent a message
body.validate: {{ caller }} called for action about {{ title }}. Is the action done yet?

done-positive.information: Done. We've sent your response to the organizer. What next?
done-positive.volunteer: Done, we've notified the organizer that you'll volunteer. What next?
done-positive.validate: We've recorded the action item as done. What next?

done-negative.information: Okay, we've skipped sending anything to the organizer. What next?
done-negative.volunteer: Alright, we haven't recorded you as a volunteer. What next?
done-negative.validate: Okay, the action item hasn't been recorded as done. What next?

respond.failed: Sorry, something went wrong recording your response. Please try again later or just dial *134*1994#

already.title: Already responded
already.body: You have already responded to this action item. Each member cannot respond more than once. If you would like to change your response, please contact the organizer, {{ caller }} at email: {{callerEmail}} or phone: {{callerPhone}}. Thanks for participating!

closed.title: Already past
closed.body: Responses for this action item were already due and the deadline has past

broadcast.done: Done! Message sent to all members who responded

cancel.title: Confirm cancellation
cancel.body: Are you sure? This will generate a notification to all members that the meeting is cancelled
cancel.done: Done. The meeting has been cancelled and members notified

change.title: Enter new date and time
change.note: Note: This will send a message to all meeting attendees to notify them of the changed date and time.
change.done: Done! The meeting date and time have been changed and members notified

respond.title: Are you attending?
respond.body: {{ caller }} has called a meeting about {{ title }}, at {{ location }}, on {{ date }}. Will you attend?
respond.done-yes: Done. Your attendance has been recorded and, if the meeting organizer has set one, you will be reminded before time
respond.done-no: Okay, we've noted that you won't be attending. What next?
respond.failed: Sorry, something went wrong recording your attendance. Please try again later or just dial *134*1994#

already.title: Already responded
already.body-yes: You have already responded to this meeting invite, and indicated you will attend. If you want to alter your response, you can do so by clicking below
already.body-no: You have already responded to this meeting invite, and indicated you won't attend. If you want to alter your response, you can do so by clicking below

closed.title: Meeting already past
closed.body: The date and time of this meeting have already past. If you want more details, please contact the meeting organizer, {{ caller }}.

respond.title: What is your vote?
respond.body: {{ caller }} has called a vote on {{ title }}, by {{ date }}. What do you respond?
respond.info: Note: Votes via Grassroot are at present exclusively for informal polling within groups. Your individual vote is secret and results will be distributed to all group members after the vote closes.
respond.done-yes: Done. Your vote has been recorded. You will receive the results when the vote closes. What next?
respond.failed: Sorry, something went wrong recording your vote. Please try again later or just dial *134*1994#

already.title: Already voted
already.body: You have already cast your vote (your vote is confidential, and so is not disclosed here, or anywhere). Vote results will be distributed to all memebrs after the vote closes.

closed.title: Vote closed
closed.body: This vote has already closed. Responses were distributed to members via notifications. For more details, contact the vote caller, {{ caller }}.

authfailed.title: Access denied
authfailed.body: Sorry, but your link has failed security checks. Please check it and try again, or contact your Grassroot group organizer.

public.title: Grassroot LiveWire
public.subtitle: News alerts generated by community leaders and groups using Grassroot

tags-modal.title: Tag alert
tags-modal.label: PLEASE ADD TAGS BELOW (SEPARATED BY COMMAS)

release-modal.title: Release alert
release-modal.label: RELEASE THIS ALERT TO THE MEDIA?

initiate.title: Unsubscribe
initiate.body: You are about to unsubscribe from the group, and will no longer receive notifications or emails from it. Are you sure?
initiate.body-group: You are about to unsubscribe from {{ name }}, and will no longer receive notifications or emails from it. Are you sure?

succeeded.title: Done
succeeded.body: You have unsubscribed from the group. If you feel the group has been abusive, you can also send us a report at contact@grassroot.org.za

failed.title: Error
failed.body: Sorry, something went wrong unsubscribing you from the group. If you are already a Grassroot user, try logging out and then clicking on the link again. Otherwise you can email us at contact@grassroot.org.za
